name: Forbidden Dessert II: The Third Dimension (SoDeep)
name_original: Forbidden Dessert II: The Third Dimension (SoDeep)
description:
Have you ever wanted to eat snacks in your room while watching TV but your parents don't allow you to? Because same. In this 3D version of Forbidden Dessert, you'll have to walk around your house to safely get to the kitchen and get the perfect snack. Adventure awaits. Good luck.

I made this game for my Game Design II final project with Caleb Obeng (ryterex.itch.io).
